An apology of the treatise De non temerandis ecclesiis against a treatie by an unknowne authour, written against it in some particulars / by Sir Henry Spelman Knight ; also his epistle to Richard Carew Esquire, of Anthony in Cornwall concerning tithes. Spelman, Henry, Sir, 1564?-1641.
[36], 27 p.
Printed by J.L. for Philemon Stephens, and are to be sold at his shop ..., London : 1646.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
=======
